description: A Spanish-language scene with Mr. Jaramillo, who plays Fidel Castro in “Hierba Mala Nunca Muere,” a farce by Juan Claudio Lechín at Repertorio Español.
title: In Performance | Germán Jaramillo
title_page: In Performance | Germán Jaramillo - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Stripped of costumes and props, today’s best-known artists from the Broadway stage and Carnegie Hall offer intimate and thrilling performances for the camera.
